txt.en: This scroll bestows the Virtues of the Valar quest. Completing it will allow you to access your Virtue Token Coffer, which you can use to improve your Virtues.

Complete this quest to gain access to tokens that will allow you to advance your Virtues to an appropriate tier for your level.

<rgb=#FFFF00>Important: Make sure to select each virtue you wish to advance before using the virtue items!
 -> Open Traits Panel: 'j'
 -> Select Tab: Virtue Traits
 -> Select Virtue</rgb>
Virtues of the Valar - Intro Quest

This quest grants access to the Virtue Token Coffer, which is used to advance each of your virtues to your new level.\n\n<rgb=#FFFF00>Make sure to select the virtue(s) you want to advance before consuming each token!</rgb>
You may complete this quest at any time.
